title: Front Wheel Bearings Inspection

body.body: Only remove raised witness marks from within the wheel. Removal of material below any raised areas will reduce the level of interference between the wheel and the bearings. Loss of interference could cause the bearing to become loose in the wheel leading to loss of motorcycle control and an accident.
Examine the wheel for any raised witness marks caused by the removal process. Remove any such marks with fine emery paper or a gentle file.
